original: @384b * // thabs shes sgron ma bzhugs //
analyzed: thabs shes sgron ma bzhugs

original: # // dus gsum rgyal bas ji ltar thugs chud pa'i //
analyzed: dus gsum rgyal ba ji ltar thugs chud ba

original: chos kyi rang bzhin rig pa'i rnal 'byor pas //
analyzed: chos kyi rang bzhin rig ba rnal byor ba

original: ma thob thob phyir brtson par mi byed kyang //
analyzed: ma thob thob phyir brtson ba mi byed kyang

original: snying rje'i bye brag thabs kyi spyod pa'ang ston //
analyzed: snying rje bye brag thabs kyi spyod ba ston

original: ji ltar mkha' la 'ja' tshon rnam mang yang //
analyzed: ji ltar mkha la ja tshon rnam mang yang

original: nam mkha'i ngang du ro gcig bye brag med //
analyzed: nam mkha ngang du ro gcig bye brag med

original: de bzhin rgyal ba'i gzugs sku rnam mang yang //
analyzed: de bzhin rgyal ba gzugs sku rnam mang yang

original: ye shes dbyings @385a * //
analyzed: ye shes dbyings

original: su ro gcig bye brag med //
analyzed: su ro gcig bye brag med

original: bde gshegs snying po sems kyi rang bzhin la //
analyzed: bde gshegs snying po sems kyi rang bzhin la

original: yun ring dus nas rmongs pa'i sems can rnams //
analyzed: yun ring dus nas rmongs ba sems can rnams

original: bdag tu 'dzin pa'i sems rgyud so sor snang //
analyzed: bdag tu dzin ba sems brgyud so sor snang

original: rang bzhin nyid ni rgyal ba'i chos skur gcig / ye shes sgyu mar snang ba'i sangs rgyas dang // log rtog sgyu mar snang ba'i sems can gnyis //
analyzed: rang bzhin nyid ni rgyal ba chos skur gcig ye shes sgyu mar snang ba sangs rgya dang log rtogs sgyu mar snang ba sems can gnyis

original: ye shes log rtog khyad par bsam yas kyang //
analyzed: ye shes log rtogs khyad ba bsam yas kyang

original: sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam //
analyzed: sgyu ma yin phyir rang bzhin yongs kyis mnyam

original: sems can sangs rgyas bden par tshul gcig cing //
analyzed: sems can sangs rgya bden ba tshul gcig cing

original: rang gi sems nyid sangs rgyas yin shes na //
analyzed: rang gi sems nyid sangs rgya yin shes na

original: gzhan nas bsgrub par bya ba ci yang med //
analyzed: gzhan nas sgrub ba byed ba ci yang med

original: de lta bas na spang bar bya ba'ang med //
analyzed: de lta ba na spong ba byed ba med

original: 'di lta bu yi chos kyi tshul rig na //
analyzed: di lta bu yi chos kyi tshul rig na

original: ma rig rnams la snying rje yongs kyis skye //
analyzed: ma rig rnams la snying rje yongs kyis skye

original: snying rje skyes nas sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin gyis //
analyzed: snying rje skye nas sgyu ma ting dzin gyis

original: phan 'dogs thabs kyi spyod pa cir yang ston //
analyzed: phan dogs thabs kyi spyod ba cir yang ston

original: sangs rgyas dgongs pa ji lta ba //
analyzed: sangs rgya dgongs ba ji lta ba

original: sems kyi rang bzhin gnas med de ltar bsgom //
analyzed: sems kyi rang bzhin gnas med de ltar bsgom

original: thugs rje'i 'bad pa rab 'byams ji lta ba //
analyzed: thugs rje bad ba rab byam ji lta ba

original: rnal 'byor thabs kyi ting 'dzin de ltar sprul //
analyzed: rnal byor thabs kyi ting dzin de ltar sprul

original: bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: bdag dang bdag gir dzin ba med ba phyir

original: pha rol phyin drug dmigs med rdzogs par ldan //
analyzed: pha rol phyin drug dmigs med rdzogs ba ldan

original: thabs kyi spyod pas gdul bya kun 'dul yang //
analyzed: thabs kyi spyod ba gdul byed kun dul yang

original: sgyu ma'i blo ldan rlom sems ci yang med //
analyzed: sgyu ma blo ldan rlom sems ci yang med

original: ma skyes sems la sems can med pa'i phyir //
analyzed: ma skye sems la sems can med ba phyir

original: ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku'i nga rgyal 'chang //
analyzed: ngo bo nyid kyi chos sku nga rgyal chang

original: chos kun sgyu mar mngon sum gsal ba'i phyir //
analyzed: chos kun sgyu mar mngon sum gsal ba phyir

analyzed: ting dzin sgyu mas ci du de ltar ston
